mapper.sql: o.ID, o.C_ACCOUNT, o.C_PASSWORD, o.C_NAME, o.C_TEL, o.C_ROLE_ID, o.C_PROPERTY_ID, ur.C_NAME AS roleName, p.C_NAME AS propertyName, p.C_STATUS AS propertyStatus
mapper.select: SELECT FROM auth_user o LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON o.C_ROLE_ID = ur.ID LEFT JOIN property p ON o.C_PROPERTY_ID = p.ID WHERE 1=1
SELECT FROM auth_user o LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON o.C_ROLE_ID = ur.ID LEFT JOIN property p ON o.C_PROPERTY_ID = p.ID WHERE o.C_ACCOUNT = #{account} AND o.C_PASSWORD = #{password}
SELECT FROM auth_user o LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON o.C_ROLE_ID = ur.ID LEFT JOIN property p ON o.C_PROPERTY_ID = p.ID WHERE o.ID = #{userId}
SELECT FROM auth_user o LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON o.C_ROLE_ID = ur.ID LEFT JOIN property p ON o.C_PROPERTY_ID = p.ID WHERE o.C_ACCOUNT = #{account}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auth_user ( C_ACCOUNT, C_PASSWORD, C_NAME, C_TEL, C_ROLE_ID, C_PROPERTY_ID ) VALUES ( #{account}, #{password}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{roleId}, #{propertyId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE auth_user SET C_ACCOUNT = #{account}, C_PASSWORD = #{password}, C_NAME = #{name}, C_TEL = #{tel}, C_ROLE_ID = #{roleId}, C_PROPERTY_ID = #{propertyId} WHERE ID = #{id}
